com.chaika.utilidades

Class NothingSelectedSpinnerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chaika.utilidades.NothingSelectedSpinnerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class NothingSelectedSpinnerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ListAdapter
    Clase no utilizada Decorator Adapter to allow a Spinner to show a 'Nothing Selected...' initially displayed instead of the first choice in the Adapter.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NothingSelectedSpinnerAdapter(android.widget.SpinnerAdapter spinnerAdapter, int nothingSelectedLayout, android.content.Context context)
      Deprecated. 
      Use this constructor to have NO 'Select One...' item, instead use the standard prompt or nothing at all.
      NothingSelectedSpinnerAdapter(android.widget.SpinnerAdapter spinnerAdapter, int nothingSelectedLayout, int nothingSelectedDropdownLayout, android.content.Context context)
      Deprecated. 
      Use this constructor to Define your 'Select One...' layout as the first row in the returned choices.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NothingSelectedSpinnerAdapter

        public NothingSelectedSpinnerAdapter(android.widget.SpinnerAdapter spinnerAdapter,
                                     int nothingSelectedLayout,
                                     android.content.Context context)
        Deprecated. 
        Use this constructor to have NO 'Select One...' item, instead use the standard prompt or nothing at all.
        Parameters:
        spinnerAdapter - wrapped Adapter.
        nothingSelectedLayout - layout for nothing selected, perhaps you want text grayed out like a prompt...
        context -

      • NothingSelectedSpinnerAdapter

        public NothingSelectedSpinnerAdapter(android.widget.SpinnerAdapter spinnerAdapter,
                                     int nothingSelectedLayout,
                                     int nothingSelectedDropdownLayout,
                                     android.content.Context context)
        Deprecated. 
        Use this constructor to Define your 'Select One...' layout as the first row in the returned choices. If you do this, you probably don't want a prompt on your spinner or it'll have two 'Select' rows.
        Parameters:
        spinnerAdapter - wrapped Adapter. Should probably return false for isEnabled(0)
        nothingSelectedLayout - layout for nothing selected, perhaps you want text grayed out like a prompt...
        nothingSelectedDropdownLayout - layout for your 'Select an Item...' in the dropdown.
        context -
